name: lawbot
text: You know Polish isn't Scandinavian, right?

name: pr0ncess
text: um yeah Poland is so up and Scandinavian, just like the rest of Eastern Europe...

name: stormagnet
text: No, it's Slavic.

name: pr0ncess
text: Being European I am actually aware of this fact. I was taking the mick, a favoured occupation of us European types.

name: stormagnet
text: Sorry, I realize this in retrospect. I had just opened my account; it went to my head.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Also Finnish is not a Scandinavian language either.

name: tasteful
text: chubby for linguistic knowledge, finnish is an anomaly

name: genequagmire
text: Lest we forget the ugrics.

name: mashisoyo
text: Well, yeah, but strangely put. Scandinavia is a geographical division, so I'd say that Finnish is Scandinavian. It's not Indo-European though.

name: farqussus
text: don't say that near a Fin

name: shutup_shutup
text: "Scandinavian languages" is also synonymous with "North Germanic languages," the subgroup within which Swedish, Norwegian, etc. are found.

name: mashisoyo
text: You're right! Take this chubby as recompense for my expression of doubt.

name: shutup_shutup
text: It's cool. I just see all things in terms of linguistics.

text: Me too!

name: nyu
text: Im surprised Onstad didn't comment on the fact that a lot of German TV stations go from Sesame Street to literally softcore porn as soon as the sun goes down.

name: juanclaudius
text: The weird thing I noticed about German TV was that all the channels turned to softcore porn, except for one, which was a children's show of sorts. When I saw this, I decided to love Germany.

name: endoftheworld
text:
God, that shot of Philippe. He's totally doing Orson Welles in The Third Man.

"You know, I never feel comfortable on these sort of things. Victims? Don't be melodramatic. Tell me. Would you really feel any pity if one of those dots stopped moving forever? If I offered you twenty thousand pounds for every dot that stopped, would you really, old man, tell me to keep my money, or would you calculate how many dots you could afford to spare? Free of income tax, old man. Free of income tax - the only way you can save money nowadays..."

name: ferae_machinae
text: I too have been on the Ferris Wheel. I'm sure Phillippe was disappointed by the graffiti

name: kennisiou
text:
Despite my fear of heights, I have been on the world's largest Ferris Wheel.

It wasn't so bad. The cars were so large that I could keep away from the windows and just appreciate the view outside without having to see how high up I was.

name: ganymedeio
text: That was 42 more wilty dick pictures than I was willing to look at today.
